channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 智库称中国儿童保育成本位居全球最高
item.description: China is one of the world's most expensive places to raise a child, relative to its GDP per capita, a prominent Chinese think tank said on Wednesday as it detailed the time and opportunity costs for women who opt to have children in the country.翻译:中国一家著名智库周三表示，相对于人均国内生产总值而言，中国是世界上抚养孩子成本最高的国家之一，同时详细介绍了选择在中国生孩子的女性的时间和机会成本。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国游客涌向东南亚 澳大利亚惨遭淘汰
item.description: As Chinese tourism booms to visa-free countries in Southeast Asia, Australia is losing out, with more cost-conscious mainland travellers also choosing cheaper destinations closer to home, according to tour operators and industry data.翻译:旅行社和行业数据显示，随着中国游客涌入东南亚免签证国家，澳大利亚正在遭受损失，更多注重成本的大陆游客也选择离家更近、价格更便宜的目的地。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 快时尚Shein、Temu的崛起搅动全球航空货运业
item.description: The rapid rise of fast-fashion e-commerce retailers such as Shein and Temu is upending the global air cargo industry, as they increasingly vie for limited air-cargo space to woo consumers with rapid transit times, more than ten industry sources said.翻译:十多名行业消息人士称，Shein 和 Temu 等快时尚电子商务零售商的迅速崛起正在颠覆全球航空货运业，因为它们越来越多地争夺有限的航空货运空间，以快速的运输时间吸引消费者。
item.author: Arriana McLymore, Casey Hall, Lisa Barrington

item.title: 中国银行根据“白名单”项目批准170亿美元贷款 - 住房管理局
item.description: China's housing authority said 123.6 billion yuan ($17.20 billion) of development loans have been approved and 29.4 billion yuan have been issued under a special mechanism aimed at injecting liquidity into the crisis-hit property sector.翻译:中国住房和城乡建设管理局表示，已批准1236亿元人民币（172亿美元）的开发贷款，并根据一项旨在为受危机打击的房地产行业注入流动性的特殊机制发放了294亿元人民币。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 大雪过后，中国首都关闭了高速公路
item.description: Authorities in Beijing shut some highways on Wednesday after heavier-than-expected snowfall hit the Chinese capital, part of a cold spell sweeping many parts of the country this week.翻译:北京当局周三关闭了部分高速公路，此前中国首都遭遇了比预期更大的降雪，这是本周席卷中国许多地区的寒流的一部分。
item.author: Liz Lee, Alessandro Diviggiano

item.title: 汇丰银行30亿美元的中国减记额创下年度利润纪录
item.description: HSBC Holdings reported a record annual profit, that nonetheless came in below analysts' forecasts as the income boost from higher interest rates was offset by a hefty $3 billion charge from its stake in a Chinese bank.翻译:汇丰控股公布了创纪录的年度利润，但仍低于分析师的预期，因为高利率带来的收入增长被其持有的一家中国银行股份的 30 亿美元巨额费用所抵消。
item.author: Selena Li, Lawrence White

item.title: 台湾称尚未加强在前线岛屿的军事部署
item.description: Taiwan has not increased military deployments on frontline islands facing China and there is nothing unusual in the military situation around Taiwan, the defence ministry said on Wednesday amid a rise in tensions with Beijing.翻译:台湾国防部周三表示，在与北京的紧张关系加剧之际，台湾没有在面向中国的前线岛屿上增加军事部署，台湾周边的军事局势也没有什么异常。
item.author: Yimou Lee, Ann Wang

item.title: 香港人口猛增至 750 万，这是疫情后第二年的增长
item.description: Hong Kong's population rose 0.4% to 7.50 million in 2023, boosted by a net inflow of returning residents and people on residential schemes, the government said, as the financial hub marked its second year of population growth since the pandemic.翻译:政府表示，受回国居民和住宅计划人口净流入的推动，2023年香港人口将增长0.4%，达到750万，而香港金融中心正迎来疫情以来人口第二年增长。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 投资者期待英伟达财报，中国提振亚洲股市
item.description: Chinese markets lifted Asian stocks on Wednesday on optimism over steps taken by policymakers to boost confidence, while looming earnings from Nvidia kept investors on edge following the recent frenzied AI-driven global rally.翻译:由于政策制定者采取措施提振信心，中国市场周三提振亚洲股市，而在最近由人工智能驱动的全球疯狂上涨之后，英伟达即将公布的盈利让投资者感到紧张。
item.author: Ankur Banerjee

item.title: 阿里巴巴是中国逆势投资的终极赌注
item.description: “If you invest with us,” Jack Ma wrote in his inaugural letter to shareholders in 2014, “you will be embarking on a journey with Alibaba.” A decade on, the invitation from the Chinese e-commerce group’s co-founder and former chairman reads more like a warning. Following its New York stock market debut later that year, Alibaba’s , market capitalisation soared to reach $858 billion in 2020 only to t翻译:“如果你和我们一起投资，”马云在 2014 年致股东的就职信中写道，“你将与阿里巴巴一起踏上旅程。”十年过去了，这家中国电子商务集团联合创始人兼前董事长的邀请读起来更像是一个警告。继当年晚些时候在纽约股市首次亮相后，阿里巴巴的市值在 2020 年飙升至 8580 亿美元，仅此而已。
item.author: Robyn Mak

item.title: 因朝鲜走私案在澳大利亚被捕的中国男子面临被引渡到美国
item.description: A Chinese man arrested in Australia is awaiting extradition to the United States for alleged involvement in a North Korean scheme to generate revenue by selling counterfeit cigarettes, Australian authorities said on Wednesday.翻译:澳大利亚当局周三表示，一名在澳大利亚被捕的中国男子因涉嫌参与朝鲜通过销售假烟创收的计划而正在等待引渡到美国。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 外交部长表示中方希望法国继续在稳定的中欧关系中发挥作用
item.description: China hopes France will continue a constructive role in developing healthy and stable Sino-European relations by enhancing mutual trust and promoting integration of interests, Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi said.翻译:中国外交部长王毅表示，中方希望法方继续为发展健康稳定的中欧关系发挥建设性作用，增进互信，促进利益融合。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国对美国否决以色列与哈马斯停火投票感到失望 - 官方媒体
item.description: China expressed "strong disappointment" over the United States blocking a draft United Nations Security Council resolution on the Israel-Hamas war calling for an immediate humanitarian ceasefire, Xinhua said on Wednesday, citing its U.N. representative Zhang Jun.翻译:新华社周三援引中国驻联合国代表张军的话说，中国对美国阻止联合国安理会关于以色列-哈马斯战争的决议草案表示“强烈失望”，该决议草案呼吁立即人道主义停火。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 土耳其拘留六名涉嫌为中国监视维吾尔人的人
item.description: Turkish authorities have detained six people suspected of spying on Uyghurs in Turkey for China's intelligence service, and another suspect was being sought by police, state-run Anadolu news agency reported on Tuesday.翻译:据国营阿纳多卢通讯社周二报道，土耳其当局拘留了六名涉嫌为中国情报部门在土耳其监视维吾尔人的人，另一名嫌疑人正在接受警方追捕。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 澳大利亚作家杨恒均不会上诉在中国的死刑缓期执行 - 家人
item.description: Australian writer Yang Hengjun will not appeal a suspended death sentence in China because the process would delay the possibility of supervised medical care, his family said in a statement on Wednesday.翻译:澳大利亚作家杨恒均的家人周三在一份声明中表示，他不会对中国的死刑缓期判决提出上诉，因为这一过程将延迟接受监督医疗护理的可能性。
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 补时阶段贾德森进球，山东队晋级亚冠八强
item.description: Brazilian defender Jadson scored seven minutes into stoppage time to earn Shandong Taishan a 4-2 win over Kawasaki Frontale on Tuesday to take the Chinese side into the quarter-finals of the Asian Champions League with a 6-5 aggregate victory.翻译:周二，巴西后卫贾德森在伤停补时第7分钟进球，帮助山东泰山4-2战胜川崎前锋，以总比分6-5晋级亚冠八强。
item.author: Michael Church

item.title: 欧盟贸易主管称中国必须看到改革世贸组织规则的必要性
item.description: China needs to play a constructive role in talks at the World Trade Organization to reform global trade rules on industrial subsidies or risk rivals setting their own policies at China's expense, the European Union's trade chief said on Monday.翻译:欧盟贸易负责人周一表示，中国需要在世界贸易组织的谈判中发挥建设性作用，以改革有关工业补贴的全球贸易规则，否则竞争对手将面临以牺牲中国利益为代价制定自己的政策的风险。
item.author: Philip Blenkinsop

item.title: 英伟达的强劲增长可能仍令一些投资者失望
item.description: Nvidia is set to post a more than three-fold surge in its fourth-quarter revenue on Wednesday, the same as in the previous quarter, as demand for its chips that dominate the market for artificial intelligence outstrips supply.翻译:由于主导人工智能市场的芯片供不应求，英伟达第四季度营收周三将增长三倍以上，与上一季度持平。
item.author: Arsheeya Bajwa

item.title: 高盛表示，对冲基金在降息前加倍押注中国
item.description: Hedge funds favoured Asian emerging markets in the week to Feb. 15, piling into company stocks in China, Korea, Taiwan, and India, in moves that came just before China slashed its benchmark mortgage rate, Goldman Sachs research showed.翻译:高盛的研究显示，截至2月15日当周，对冲基金青睐亚洲新兴市场，纷纷买入中国、韩国、台湾和印度的公司股票，此举发生在中国大幅下调基准抵押贷款利率之前。
item.author: Nell Mackenzie, Summer Zhen

item.title: 早盘竞价：利率焦虑、中国降息和信用卡交易
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters
